campaigns.title: Winter Warmth for Dhaka
campaigns.description: Help us provide warm clothing to underprivileged communities in Dhaka during the winter season.

campaigns.title: Blankets for Rajshahi
campaigns.description: Support our initiative to distribute blankets to rural areas in Rajshahi division.

campaigns.title: Warm Clothes for Sylhet
campaigns.description: Join us in providing winter clothing to tea garden workers in Sylhet.

campaigns.title: Chittagong Hill Tracts Support
campaigns.description: Help indigenous communities in Chittagong Hill Tracts stay warm this winter.

campaigns.title: Khulna Winter Relief
campaigns.description: Support coastal communities in Khulna with warm clothing and blankets.

campaigns.title: Rangpur Rural Support
campaigns.description: Help rural communities in Rangpur division cope with extreme winter conditions.
